page.title: 18Through the eyes of a child
page.content:
Mohammed aged eight :- My favourite place is a camp. It is dark and scary. Outside it is cold. I like my camp and it's got butterflies , caterpillars and bumble bees and grasshoppers. Everyday I go with my friend. We buy sweets and crisps and lollipops to have a party in the camp. The camp is in Hessel Street and smells like fish.
Sarmine aged nine :- My favourite place is school. When it is dinner time the school smells nice. Everyday it smells of fish and chips. When it is quiet I think I'm in the sky, in the clouds. But when it's noisy it feels like I'm with a lot of monsters.
Gous aged nine :- My favourite place is a factory where there is a postbox and we play the letter game there.
